pros: Fantastic value; Summer-ready mesh upper; Enough stack height; Stable ride; Good for heel strikers; Ready for hiking; GEL technology for amazing impact protection
cons: Durability could be better; Lacks energy return; Heavy
RR_verdict: The ASICS Gel Venture 9 is a versatile trail runner and hiker that offered us impressive comfort and jaw-dropping breathability during our testing at a pocket-friendly price. While we didn't find it to be the most durable, it's tough to find a better trail shoe at just $80. Treating our feet with nice cushioning, we believe that it excels in delivering an enjoyable experience on the trail.
awards: Top pick in best trail running shoes, Top pick in best cheap running shoes, Top 21% most popular running shoes
